chunks.text: In today's video, I will tell you about CSS transforms.

chunks.title: CSS Transforms MasterClass
chunks.text: There are two types of transforms on CSS.

chunks.title: CSS Transforms MasterClass
chunks.text: One is 2D transform and the other is 3D transform.

chunks.title: CSS Transforms MasterClass
chunks.text: 2D transform means we want to change any object in two-dimensional space.

chunks.title: CSS Transforms MasterClass
chunks.text: Like we can increase its scale, we can translate it, we can rotate it.

chunks.title: CSS Transforms MasterClass
chunks.text: 3D transform on the other hand works on three dimensions.

chunks.title: CSS Transforms MasterClass
chunks.text: That is, we have an additional axis, z-axis.

chunks.title: CSS Transforms MasterClass
chunks.text: Because of which we can manipulate an object in three dimensions.

chunks.title: CSS Transforms MasterClass
chunks.text: Don't get confused about how these things are done.
